params._status: of operator to toggle (true == allowed to drip)

params._nftCount: number of NFTs to mint per drip

params._status: of operator to toggle (true === is super operator)

FaucetDrained(address).notice: Emitted after faucet drained to a recipient

FaucetDripped(address).notice: Emitted after faucet drips to a recipient

OperatorUpdated(address,bool).notice: Emitted after operator status is updated

SuperOperatorUpdated(address,bool).notice: Emitted after super operator is updated

NFT_COUNT().notice: Number of ERC721 NFTs to mint

availableDrips().notice: Returns number of available drips by token

drain(address).notice: Allows super operator to drain contract of tokens

drip(address).notice: Drips and mints tokens to recipient

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Override internal ERC721 function to return single image per NFT

updateApprovedOperator(address,bool).notice: Allows super operator to update approved drip operator status

updateDripAmounts(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Allows super operator to update drip amounts

updateSuperOperator(address,bool).notice: Allows super operator to update super operator

updateTokenURI(string).notice: Allows super operator to update NFT uri

userdoc.notice: Drips ETH, DAI, wETH, and mints NFTs
